00042     list<Link>::iterator
00043     Neuron::findLink(Neuron* _to, Link::Direction _direction)
00044     {                                                                                
00045         list<Link>::iterator result = links.end();
00046         list<Link>::iterator iter = links.begin();
00047         for(; iter != links.end(); ++iter)                                           
00048         {                                                                            
00049             if(iter->getTo() == _to && iter->getDirection() == _direction)                     
00050             {                                                                        
00051                 if(result != links.end()) //Multiple parallel links exist          
00052                     throw Exception::MultipleOccurance()<<"findLink(): detected parallel links\n";
00053                 else                                                                              
00054                     result = iter;                                                                
00055             }                                                                                     
00056         }                                                                                         
00057 
00058         if(result == links.end())
00059             throw Exception::ObjectNotFound()<<"findLink(): can't find required link\n";
00060 
00061         return result;
00062     } //findLink
